text: Geoje Station () is a station of the Busan Metro Line 3 and Donghae Line in Geoje-dong, Yeonje District, Busan, South Korea. The station is unrelated to the Geojehaemaji Station of Korail. Nammungu Station () on Donghae Line became Geojehaemaji Station on December 30, 2016. ==Station Layout== ===Line 3=== {|style="text-align:center;" |- | ↑ |- || S/B N/B |- | ↓ |} {| border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="3" frame="hsides" rules="rows" |- !
